name: Illini Gym
desc: I created an iOS app that allows UIUC students to monitor gym occupancy in real-time, making workout planning easier. We gained over 5,000 active users within the first two weeks, greatly improving gym utilization and user satisfaction.

name: MindMint: Empowering Education with AI & NFTs
desc: MindMint, an award-winning app from Stanford TreeHacks, uses AI and NFTs to make learning fun for students. It features an engaging student interface and a powerful teacher platform to boost student engagement.

name: NQL: SQL Chatbot
desc: Developed NQL, a chatbot that simplifies data retrieval through natural language, making complex queries easy for non-technical users.

name: Code For Good
desc: Built an app to fight child trafficking, offering robust monitoring tools and educational resources to protect vulnerable populations globally.

name: OranjBot: Internal AI Assistant
desc: Created OranjBot, an AI chatbot that provides instant support for SEI developers, streamlining workflows by addressing common questions by finetuning an LLM with internal documents.
